resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106645</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106645</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206959</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Invention Factory: Thomas Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfindung-Fabrik: Thomas Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usine d'Invention : Thomas Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fábrica Da Invenção: Thomas Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fabbrica Di Invenzione: Thomas Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργοστάσιο εφευρέσεων: Θ*Τχομας Edison</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fábrica De la Invención: Thomas Edison</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a curriculum-oriented guide to the work and laboratories of the great American inventor. The site contains photographs, maps, and readings about the laboratories and the process of turning research into commercial products.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Lehrplan-orientierte Anleitung zur Arbeit
und zu den Labors des großen amerikanischen Erfinders. Die Site
enthält Fotographien, Karten und Messwerte über die Labors und den 
Prozeß des Machens von von Forschung zu Handelsprodukte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un guide programme d'études-orienté du 
travail et des laboratoires du grand inventeur américain. Le 
site contient des photographies, des cartes, et des lectures au sujet 
des laboratoires et le processus de transformer la recherche en 
produits commercial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma guia curriculum-orientada ao trabalho e aos
laboratórios do inventor americano grande. O local contem 
fotografias, mapas, e leituras sobre os laboratórios e o processo de 
girar a pesquisa em produtos comerciais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una guida programma di studi-orientata al 
lavoro ed ai laboratori dell'inventore americano grande. Il 
luogo contiene le fotografie, i programmi e le letture circa i 
laboratori ed il processo di trasformare nella ricerca i prodotti 
commerciali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένας πρόγραμμα σπουδών-προσανατολισμένος στο 
οδηγός στην εργασία και τα εργαστήρια του μεγάλου αμερικανικού 
εφευρέτη. Η περιοχή περιέχει τις φωτογραφίες, τους χάρτες, 
και τις αναγνώσεις για τα εργαστήρια και τη διαδικασία την έρευνα 
σε εμπορικά προϊόντα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una guía plan de estudios-orientada al trabajo
y a los laboratorios del gran inventor americano. El sitio 
contiene las fotografías, las correspondencias, y las lecturas sobre 
los laboratorios y el proceso de dar vuelta a la investigación en 
productos comerciales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206959</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106645</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/invention-factory-thomas-edison</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
